cause.description:
Junior Achievement is the leading global organization enabling students to be self-sufficient, culturally aware, contributing leaders in their communities and in the world. Junior Achievement annually teaches 7 million elementary, middle school and high school students in 100 countries. Locally, we have partnered with Silicon Valley and Monterey businesses, communities and schools since 1953 and have taught over 427,000 students. This year alone we worked with a record 33,749 young people in Silicon Valley and Monterey Bay, many in low income areas. Junior Achievement enables many millions of kids to flourish as they become adults.
1. Bringing business leaders into the classroom helps kids
2. Understanding economics is key to making good choices in life
cause.mission: Bring the business world to the classroom
cause.name: Junior Achievement Of Silicon Valley
